locks.name: Climb Tourian Gray Lock (to Tourian Escape)
Climb Top Right Gray Lock (to Crateria Supers Top)
Climb Middle Right Escape Lock (to Crateria supers Bottom)
Climb Bottom Right Escape Lock (to Pit Room)

nodes.name: Bottom Left Door Spawn At Junction

obstacles.name: Entered from the Bottom Left Door

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb Behemoth Shinespark
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right. For the top block, spark from a crouch.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Using IBJ to get from to bottom to the top of Climb without unmorphing. Precise timing and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: A long Temporary Blue chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the morph tunnels.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb Morph Tunnel SpeedBall
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Enter the room with a very specific run speed to jump from the door, avoid the ceiling, and land a speedball perfectly in the tunnel to break the Bomb block.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using scroll blocks a few tiles in front of the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Climb Behemoth Shinespark (Top Door)
note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the top right morph tunnel.
A consistent place to spark from is the small platform below the bomb block, using a crouch jump and then a diagonal spark (not a crouched diagonal spark).

strats.name: Climb Behemoth Shinespark (Top Door, Through Toilet)
note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the top right morph tunnel.
A consistent place to spark from is the small platform below the bomb block, using a crouch jump and then a diagonal spark (not a crouched diagonal spark).

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Leave with Extended Runway, Open Both Doors
Crystal Flash
strats.devNote: An unheated lava crystal flash could be added instead, but that would change the strats that come after.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top, Come in Shinecharging
strats.note: Starting with a crouch, diagonal shinespark to the top to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Blind Climb to the Top
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks next to the bomb wall
After passing through, you need to go from the bottom to the top of Climb and into the bomb blocks while still in G-mode Morph.
Samus will not be visible at all; the only available feedback is audio and position on the map.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom, Come in Shinecharging
strats.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom, Come in Shinecharging, Race the Lava
strats.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks Without XRay (Bottom Left to Bottom, Cross-Room)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with movement assists to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks next to the bomb wall
Navigate to the lower right bomb blocks while still morphed.
Samus will be off-camera and not visible, requiring blind movement.
Enemies will not hurt Samus since they are non-global and also off-camera.

strats.name: Transition with Stored Fall Speed (Shortcharge, more speed)
Transition with Stored Fall Speed (Screw Fall)
strats.note: Break the Bomb blocks using Screw Attack in a Moonfall, then escape the tiles with Grapple Beam.

strats.name: Come In Speedballing
strats.note: If needed, unmorph while passing through the blocks to break more than just the bottom one.
devNote: If we had a comeInWithSpeedball entrance condition, it should be used instead.
This strat is for using a remote runway in the previous room to get the speedball;
if the current runway were used then you could just run through with blue speed instead.

strats.name: Come In With Blue Spring Ball Bounce
Come In With Blue Space Jump
G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks immediately in front of the bomb wall
strats.devNote: This could be possible with the lava, but it would be blind and very tight.

strats.name: Zebes Ablaze
strats.devNote: These are destroyed on entry if Zebes is Ablaze.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs immediately in front of the bomb blocks.
Reach the bottom and pass through the bomb blocks while still in G-mode.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs immediately in front of the bomb blocks.
Fall down to the lower bomb blocks while still in G-mode Morph.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Climb Morph Tunnel SpeedBall (Top Right)
strats.note: Enter the room with a very specific run speed to jump from the door, and land a speedball perfectly in the tunnel to break the Bomb block.
devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.
Speeds between $6.2 and $6.A can also work but are more difficult.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Spring Ball (Come in Shinecharging)
strats.devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Spring Ball (Come in With Temporary Blue)
G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Fall down and pass through bomb wall at the bottom while still in G-mode.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Right-Side X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 7 screens.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 7 screens, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
If Morph is not available, careful movement is needed with SpringBall to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top (from Crateria Supers Bottom)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
A long series of precise bomb jumps and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph IBJ with PBs
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Place PBs as high as possible to occasionally kill multiple pirates at a time.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
strats.devNote: It is sometimes possible to beat the lava, but it depends how you get here.

strats.name: Climb Morph Tunnel SpeedBall (Lower Right)
strats.note: Enter the room with a very specific run speed to jump from the door, squeeze by the ceiling, and land a speedball perfectly in the tunnel to break the Bomb block.
devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.
The canBeExtremelyPatient requirement is for difficulty placement.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Spring Ball (Come in Shinecharging)
strats.devNote: There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Spring Ball (Come in With Temporary Blue)
G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Come In Speedballing
strats.note: If needed, unmorph while passing through the blocks to break more than just the bottom one.
devNote: If we had a comeInWithSpeedball entrance condition, it should be used instead.
This strat is for using a remote runway in the previous room to get the speedball;
if the current runway were used then you could just run through with blue speed instead.

strats.name: Come In With Blue Spring Ball Bounce
Transition with Stored Fall Speed (Shortcharge, more speed)
Transition with Stored Fall Speed (Screw Fall)
strats.note: Break the Bomb blocks using Screw Attack in a Moonfall, then escape the tiles with Grapple Beam.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top, Come in Shinecharging
strats.note: Starting with a crouch, diagonal shinespark to the top to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb to Break Bomb Block with Screw Attack
note: Use an X-Ray climb to position Samus to where she can break the Bomb block with Screw Attack.
This is an 8 screen climb.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to any of the bomb blocks in the room, allowing passage through the bomb blocks at the top by making them become air.
If Morph is not available, careful movement is needed with SpringBall to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top (from Pit Room)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
note: A long series of precise bomb jumps and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.
Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks at the top, allowing passage through them by making them become air.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph IBJ with PBs
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Place PBs as high as possible to occasionally kill multiple pirates at a time.
Overload the PLMs at the bottom, if the top bomb block is hit with a PB before PLMs are overloaded, they will remain solid.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom, Come in Shinecharging
strats.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb to Break Bomb Block with Screw Attack
note: Use an X-Ray climb to position Samus to where she can break the Bomb block with Screw Attack.
This is a 1 screen climb.
strats.devNote: This is an alternative to using Moonfall to break the block with Screw Attack.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bottom right bomb blocks, allowing passage through them by making them become air.
If Morph is unavailable, then careful movement will be required to get past the Pirates without taking a hit.
If using a PB to kill the pirates, overload the PLMs at the bottom. If the top bomb block is hit with a PB before PLMs are overloaded, they will remain solid.

strats.name: Leave with Runway
devNote: This is relatively tight when coming in from the bottom left and using a Power Bomb to break the wall.
It wouldn't work if the door was Missile or Power Bomb locked.

strats.name: Leave with Extended Runway, Open Both Doors
Zebes Ablaze
strats.devNote: These are destroyed on entry if Zebes is Ablaze.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top
strats.note: Starting with a crouch, diagonal shinespark to the top to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top, Use Flash Suit
note: Diagonal shinespark to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnel on the right.
Spark from the highest platform that is only one tile from the right wall (the morph tunnel will be off camera, but can be seen while jumping).
From this platform, the shinespark can be done with or without a crouch.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks to Top
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A long Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the top morph tunnel.
strats.devNote: The runway was reduced by 0.5 tiles, as you can't maintain Temporary Blue directly against a wall.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom
strats.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Climb Moonfall Block Break
note: The bomb blocks can be broken by spinjumping with Screw attack and holding right, if moonfall makes Samus clip through the platform.
Use the small blue platform 2nd from the top on the right side.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom, Use Flash Suit
note: Diagonal shinespark to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnel on the right.
Spark from the lowest platform that is only one tile from the right wall (part of the bottom right door will be on screen).
From this platform, the shinespark must be done from a crouch.
It is possible to set up a frozen pirate on the right wall to stop the shinespark early.
devNote: For the frozen pirate strat, it is assumed that Samus can farm the energy after the spark, resulting in no damaging shinespark frames.
FIXME: It is still possible to set up a frozen pirate, even when shinecharging on the floor.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks (Bottom Left to Bottom)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.
strats.devNote: The runway was reduced by 0.5 tiles, as you can't maintain Temporary Blue directly against a wall.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks Without XRay (Bottom Left to Bottom, In-Room)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with movement assists to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.

strats.name: Space Pirate Farm
devNote: The Space Pirates (wall) drop Supers and Power Bombs each at a 0.4% rate, too low to put into logic.
FIXME: Other nodes could be used to reset the room, with additional requirements.

strats.name: Base
strats.devNote: When Samus enters the room from the bottom left, lava starts to rise. In the escape it is acid instead.
